product_description: Typical aftershaves contain alcohol, which can dry out and irritate your skin. Instead, the Bevel Restoring Balm is an alcohol-free aftershave lotion that gives your skin a dose of moisture and helps to soothe your skin after your Bevel Shave. Use your Bevel Restoring Balm as the last step in the Bevel Shave System for a consistently smooth shave and clearer skin. The Bevel Shave System consists of The Bevel Razor, Bevel Badger Brush, Bevel Shave Cream, Bevel Priming Oil, Bevel Restoring Balm and Bevel Blades.

name: NIVEA MEN Sensitive Post Shave Balm, with VitaminPro Complex, Alcohol Free After Shave Balm for Men, 3.3 Fl Oz Bottle, Pack of 3
short_description: WITH VITAMINPRO COMPLEX: Enriched with VitaminPro Complex—Vitamin E, Provitamin B5 and Chamomile extract
FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Made for men with sensitive skin, this aftershave for men helps improve skin's defense against dryness for resilient and healthy-looking skin
ABSORBS QUICKLY: Fast-absorbing, non-greasy and non-sticky soothing after shave for men
ALCOHOL FREE POST SHAVE BALM: Post shaving balm contains no drying alcohols and is suitable for daily use
FIGHTS SIGNS OF SHAVE IRRITATION: Fights five signs of shaving irritation, including burning, micro cuts, dryness, tightness and stubble itch

product_description: NIVEA MEN Sensitive Soothing Post Shave Balm is formulated to instantly soothe shave irritation. Enriched with VitaminPro Complex—Vitamin E, Provitamin B5 and Chamomile extract—this soothing, moisturizing aftershave balm for men helps improve skin's defense against dryness for resilient and healthy-looking skin. The fast-absorbing, non-sticky and non-greasy formula helps provide your skin with long-lasting hydration and fights the five signs of shave irritation: burning, micro cuts, dryness, tightness and stubble itch. Free of drying alcohols, this mens aftershave balm is suitable for daily use. NIVEA MEN Sensitive Post Shave Balm is a key part of a skin and beard care routine and pairs well with NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shave Gel, Sensitive Face Wash and NIVEA MEN Sensitive Face Lotion with Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Sunscreen as part of a daily skincare regimen. To use, apply this after shave balm for men liberally on shaved skin, avoiding the eye area. NIVEA MEN is a trusted leader in skin care products, with more than 110 years of expertise.

name: Anthony After Shave Balm for Men, Cooling & Hydrating Lotion with Vitamins A, C & E, Aloe Vera & Botanical Extracts, 3 fl oz, Aftershave Soothes, Moisturizes & Nourishes Skin, Reduces Razor Burn
short_description: Cools & Hydrates Skin: Non-greasy, quick-absorbing moisturizer with cornmint and eucalyptus oils for a refreshing, cooling sensation. Allantoin soothes irritation, while aloe vera heals and replenishes moisture. Enriched with vitamins A, C & E to nourish, protect, and restore skin’s natural barrier. Leaves skin smooth, hydrated, and refreshed without greasiness. Perfect for daily use after shaving to maintain soft, healthy skin.

Reduces Razor Burn & Irritation: Say goodbye to post-shave redness, bumps, and discomfort. This powerful aftershave balm absorbs quickly to cool, calm, and soothe skin instantly. Infused with rosemary to reduce swelling, prevent breakouts, and promote even-toned skin. Ideal for sensitive, dry, or irritated skin. Helps combat razor bumps and ingrown hairs, making it essential for a smooth, refreshed post-shave experience every time.

For Men & Women: Specially formulated for men but loved by women, this soothing post-shave balm works wonders on all skin types. Instantly calms irritation on the face, neck, legs, underarms, and bikini area. Non-greasy and lightweight, making it ideal for everyday use. Whether shaving coarse beards or sensitive areas, this skin-replenishing formula delivers lasting hydration and protection, leaving skin soft, smooth, and comfortable.

Gentle & Safe for All Skin Types: Free from parabens, phthalates, GMOs, DEA, and triclosan, making it safe even for the most sensitive skin. Dermatologist and allergy-tested to ensure irritation-free application. Non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula won’t clog pores or leave residue. Hydrates, restores, and protects skin while being cruelty-free and made in the USA. Designed to provide long-lasting comfort and skin support after every shave.

Trusted by Experts & Grooming Professionals: Recognized by leading men’s grooming experts and featured in top publications like Men’s Health, GQ, Forbes, and Esquire. Used in over 850 high-end barber shops across the US and Canada. This high-performance formula is a favorite among professionals for its ability to instantly soothe and hydrate skin. Elevate your grooming routine with a trusted, award-winning product designed for premium post-shave care.
